sample

类 Ghost

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.shape.Shape
        • javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
          • sample.Ghost
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class Ghost
extends javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class Ghost represent the template of a ghost in pacman game

    Provided by AnimationTimer, Image, ImageView, Color, Rectangle, Random, Runnable.

    Class Ghost implements runnable to enable every ghost instance runs as a single thread by overriding run. the AnimitionTimer AnimationTimer enables the ghost to update its information at every frame of the game. the model of a ghost is a rectangle, it is hovered by the ghost icon, which could be customized by customize. The running pattern of a ghost is "move until you cannot" pattern, see moveUntilYouCant, which means a ghost will follow its current direction until there is an obstacle in front of it. The implementation of initial A* tracing algorithm makes the ghost AI available, see tracePacman.

    版本:
    1.03
    作者:
    Boon Giin Lee, Heng Yu, Chen Liao

      • Ghost

        public Ghost(double x,
             double y,
             javafx.scene.paint.Color color,
             Maze maze,
             GameManager gameManager)
        Method Ghost is the constructor of the class Ghost
        参数:
        x - : position x
        y - : position y
        color - : color of the ghost
        maze - : the generated maze
        gameManager - : the generated instance of class GameManager

    • 方法详细资料

      • customize

        public void customize(java.lang.String path)
        Method customize enables the icon customization for ghost instances
        参数:
        path - the icon path in the source

      • speedSetter

        public void speedSetter(int level)
        Method speedSetter sets speed of a ghost.
        参数:
        level - : the difficulty of the game, also representing the speed of the ghost.

      • getRandomDirection

        private java.lang.String getRandomDirection(java.lang.String exclude1,
                                            java.lang.String exclude2)
        Method getRandomDirection enables the ghost to randomly choose the direction except for the specified two. If the difficulty level is greater than or equal to 6, Ghost AI will be adapted by tracePacman.
        参数:
        exclude1 - : unavailable direction 1
        exclude2 - : unavailable direction 2
        返回:
        next randomly choosed direction

      • getRandomBoolean

        private boolean getRandomBoolean()
        Method getRandomBoolean returns a random boolean.
        返回:
        : a random boolean

      • getAnimation

        public javafx.animation.AnimationTimer getAnimation()
        Method getAnimation gets the animation for the ghost.
        返回:
        : the animation for the ghost

      • checkIftheresPathToGo

        private void checkIftheresPathToGo(java.lang.String direction)
        Method checkIftheresPathToGo check which direction is valid currently.
        参数:
        direction - : the current direction of a ghost.

      • moveUntilYouCant

        private void moveUntilYouCant(java.lang.String whereToGo,
                              java.lang.String whereToChangeTo,
                              double leftEdge,
                              double topEdge,
                              double rightEdge,
                              double bottomEdge,
                              double padding)
        Method moveUntilYouCant moves a ghost along under the current direction until there is an obstacle.
        参数:
        whereToGo - : current direction
        whereToChangeTo - : next direction
        leftEdge - : obstacle 1
        topEdge - : obstacle 2
        rightEdge - : obstacle 3
        bottomEdge - : obstacle 4
        padding - : padding with the obstacles

      • createAnimation

        public void createAnimation()
        Method createAnimation creates an animation of the ghost. A ghost could update its information visually at every frame of the game.

      • tracePacman

        public int tracePacman()
        Method tracePacman select a direction for the ghost based on A*
        返回:
        the current optimized direction.

      • checkDoorCoalition

        public void checkDoorCoalition()
        Method checkDoorCoalition checks if a ghost is passing the magic doors.

      • getIcon

        public javafx.scene.image.ImageView getIcon()
        Method getIcon returns the current icon of the ghost
        返回:
        the image view contains the current icon of the pacman

      • moveIcon

        public void moveIcon()
        Method moveIcon moves the icon of the ghost

      • run

        public void run()
        Override function, please refer to java.lang.Runnable.run
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 java.lang.Runnable
